import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../models/contact'; import { ContactListService } from '../service/contact-list.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { list: Contact[] = []; constructor(private contactListService: ContactListService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getContacts(); } getContacts() { this.contactListService.getContacts().subscribe((result: Contact[]) => this.list = result); } onDelete(id: number): void { this.contactListService.deleteContact(id).subscribe((result: Contact[]) => this.list = result); } }
